channel.title: Anton Oresten
channel.description: Essays on technology, intelligence, and society.

item.title: "That is just blogslop, your honor"
item.description: How does one balance pretense with presence and sincerity?

item.title: The Adolescence of Technology
item.description: New technologies overreach, under-deliver, and then become dependable.

item.title: Coherent Record of Thought
item.description: A chance for manifold musings to manifest
